response.overview: Gustas (25) jumps out of Karolis’ (25) moving car – as if trying to escape a dream. He acts strangely and begs to be woken up. Karolis puts him back in the car. Karolis’ sister Milda (23) joins them. Gustas calls his sister – no answer. The three end up in an underground club. The music hypnotizes Gustas. He calls again – still no answer. Later, Milda and Gustas return to his home. In bed lies his sister’s lifeless body. Milda is shocked. Gustas calmly says, “Don’t worry. It’s just a dream.”
response.title: Lucid Dreams
